1231.content: Robins journey with diapers has been a strange one. First it happened once while he was all alone in his room where he couldn't hold his bladder. Robin was in utter shock that this happened. He is an adult and just peed him self but he changed his pants and went on with is day. The second time was on the battle field and just had killed a theif and when he was done with the fight his bowels lost control and thankfully nobody noticed and when he got back to the barracks he changed his pants. The last time only one person noticed and it was.....
1231.title: Male

131.title: Camilla

132.content: What reasons would Corrin be in diapers?
132.title: Corrin

1321.content:
After a long and busy day with her sibling.
Corrin needed some time to herself.
So she decided to head back to her private quarters.



What was the first thing she did when she arrived at her room?
1321.title: She like them

choices: no one came into her room (she's safe)
13211.content:
"Whew... what a busy day." said Corrin as she lay down on her bed. "Who knew spending time with all 8 of my sibling can worn your out. It a good thing I get to spend all afternoon to myself. Which is actually a perfect opportunity to get into something more comfortable." and so Corrin got off her bed and open a secret compartment located under her mat. And retrieved a white t-shirt, a changing mat, some wipes, a bottle of baby powder, a pacifier, and a pack of diapers from inside.

Corrin then get undress and lay down on the changing mat with nothing but a white t-shirt on. She then start powdering herself and then put the diaper on. As she got up she walk to her mirror look into it. She giggled to herself and rubbed her hand on the front of her diaper. "I'm amazed how super comfy these diapers are!" said Corrin

What happens next?
13211.title: Lay on her bed

132111.content:
But someone came into her room.

Who is it?

Was it Azura?
132111.title: Someone came into her room

choices: She ask Corrin why she is wearing a diaper
She exit the room and pretend she didn't see anything
1321111.content:
Azura came in to her room and said "Corrin? are you in here? if you don't mind? I would like to ask you something." But when she look at Corrin. She was surprised. "C-Corrin!?!" Corrin noticed Azura and was surprised as she was and said "A-Azura!?! W-What are you doing here!?!"

What did Azura do next?
1321111.title: Yes

13211111.content:
"Uhh… Corrin why are you wearing a diaper?" asked Azura as she is surprised to see her cousin in a diaper. "N-No Azura it not what it look like!" cried Corrin. But then she unexpectedly begin peeing in her diaper and then she started to panic. "(gasp) oh no!" cried Corrin.

Her diaper started to leak. Azura begin to blush she was blushing so much that she can't get any words out. Corrin couldn't stop her diaper from leaking so she turn away from Azura and cried "Don't look at me!" she then drop to the floor and started to cry to herself.

Azura walk over to Corrin and asked "Corrin, are you ok?" Corrin then replied "No I'm not ok... you saw me in a diaper and I wet it in front of you, I'm such a big baby." Azura felt bad for Corrin and try to comfort her "Calm down Corrin, your not a big baby, your my cousin and a true friend, I don't care if you like wearing diapers, I sill love you for who you are." said Azura. Corrin then begin to dry her tears and asked "R-Really? you mean it?" "Of course! your secret safe with me." replied Azura as she hug Corrin. Corrin felt much better knowing that she can trust Azura with her diaper related secret. "Thank you Azura, but uhh… can you change my diaper for me please? I really don't want a rash." asked Corrin.

Should Azura change Corrin's diaper?
13211111.title: She ask Corrin why she is wearing a diaper

132111111.content:
"No problem Corrin." said Azura.

And so Azura lay out the changing mat and Corrin lay down on it. Azura took off Corrin's wet diaper and grab a hygienic wipe and wipe Corrin's bottom with it. After that she starts powdering Corrin's bottom with baby powder and put a clean diaper on her.

"There we go, all nice and clean!" said Azura. "Thank you Azura, W-wait what are you doing?" Azura then begin to blow raspberries on Corrin's stomach. Corrin begin laughing and cried "(giggled) stop it Azura! I'm going to wet myself if you keep doing that!" Azura stopped and said "My apologies Corrin, but I couldn't resist."

Azura then thought to herself and wondered what it feel like to wear a diaper.

should Azura wear a diaper as well?
132111111.title: Yes

1321111111.content:
She then ask Corrin "Corrin, Is it ok if I try on one of your diapers?" Corrin is a bit surprised that Azura want to be diapered too. but she is also interested to see what Azura would look like wearing a diaper. "Sure thing Azura!" said Corrin.

And so Azura get undress with nothing but a light blue t-shirt on. Corrin lay out the changing mat and Azura lay down on it. Corrin started powdering Azura's bottom with baby powder and put a diaper on her. Azura look at her new diaper and rubbed her hand on the front of her diaper and is amazed how comfy they are. "Amazing! I can see why you like wearing them, they feel really soft like a pillow." Said Azura.

But then Corrin grab a feather and said "Here come the tickle monster!" Corrin then begin to tickle Azura with her feather. Azura begin laughing and cried "(giggled) stop it Corrin! I'm going to wet myself if you keep doing that!" "Sorry Azura, but you did it to me when you change me so I'm returning the favor!" and so Corrin continue to tickle Azura with her feather until Azura end up wetting her diaper. "(gasp) oh no I wet myself!" cried Azura. Her diaper was all soaking wet and leaking.

"Whoops sorry Azura, look like I over did it." said Corrin. But then Azura begin to poop in her diaper as well. Azura try to stop herself from pooping in her diaper, but it was no use. Her diaper is so full it started to smells really bad. "Ahhhh! No this is too embarrassing! what was I thinking! if anybody saw me like this, I be humiliated and everyone will start calling me a big stinky baby! (Crying)" cried Azura as she started crying.

Corrin then felt bad for Azura, what will she do to calm Azura down?
1321111111.title: Yes

choices: grab a pacifier and put it in Azura's mouth
sing a song to calm Azura down
13211111112.content:
Corrin try to comfort her. But Azura was too busy crying to noticed her.

What should Corrin do now?
13211111112.title: try to comfort her

132111111121.content:
Corrin then grab a pacifier and put it in Azura's mouth. Azura stop crying and started sucking on the pacifier. She was confused but the pacifier help her Calm down. Corrin then started patting Azura's head and said "It ok Azura, no one going to see you like this, when ever your diaper is full or stinky I will change your diaper so you can stay nice and clean, and if anyone call you a big stinky baby, I'll will beat them up and diapered them!"

Azura felt much better knowing Corrin got her back. So she took out the pacifier from her mouth and replied with "Thank you Corrin, I feel much better now thank to you." "You're welcome Azura." replied Corrin. "And if your diaper needs changing, I be happy to change it for you." said Azura. "I be happy to let you change my diaper as long as you let me change your." said Corrin "Deal, are love for diapers can be are little secret." said Azura. "A secret that no one knows but us, and it will strengthened are bond even further." said Corrin as she and Azura hug each other.

And so after Azura got change in a clean diaper. She and Corrin agree to spend the rest of the afternoon together in diapers. The two cousins had so much fun until they realise they forgot to lock the door and Corrin's butler Jakob is happen to be in the room looking a bit freaked out after seeing Corrin and Azura in diapers "What... the... (beep)!"

Would you like to continue the story?
132111111121.title: grab a pacifier and put it in Azura's mouth

1321112.content: Was it someone from Hoshido?
1321112.title: No, someone else

13211121.content: Is the Hoshidan a boy or a girl?
13211121.title: Yes

13211122.content: Was it someone from Nohr?
13211122.title: No, someone else

choices: someone came into her room this time
no one came into her room (she's still safe)
132112.content:
Corrin then grab a pacifier and starts sucking on it. and then she lay back on her bed and grab her Nintendo switch and play on it for a while. After a half a hour of gaming. She feel the urge to pee. But as she got up and about to head to the bathroom. She remember she wearing a diaper. "Oh yeah... I don't need to go to the bathroom, I can just go in my diaper." said Corrin and so she let it all go in her diaper. Her diaper is a little soak now. "(sigh) that felt so good, but I think I'll be a lot happier in a clean diaper." said Corrin.
And so Corrin got out the changing mat again and lay down on it. She took off her wet diaper and grab a hygienic wipe and wipe herself with it. After that she powdered herself again and put a clean diaper on. She then stand up and rubbed her hand on the back of her new clean diaper. "(sigh) that better, a clean cushiony bottom is a happy bottom. (giggled)" giggled Corrin.

info.brief_description: ABDL Fire Emblem stories, what more is there to say?
info.description:
RULES
1. No sexual intercourse for characters that are under 18 years of age, or related by blood. I will remove chapters containing said content if I spot them.
2. No gore/vore/whatever else in that same vein. I would prefer that you really stick to BDSM, infantilism, and fetishes that can be linked to it. And please, try to avoid fetishistic concepts and such for characters that are below 18 years of age.
3.Have fun, don't be stupid!
